<h3 id="X38167">X(38167) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(5), X(6), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^6+(b+c)*a^5-2*(3*b^2+b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+2*b*c*(b+c)*a^3+2*(b^4+c^4-b*c*(b^2+6*b*c+c^2))*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38167) = X(6)+2*X(9956) = X(10)+2*X(18583) = 2*X(182)+X(18480) = X(355)+5*X(3618) = X(576)+2*X(3844) = X(1351)+5*X(1698) = X(1385)-4*X(3589) = X(1386)-4*X(25555) = 5*X(1656)+X(3751) = X(3579)+2*X(5480) = X(4663)+2*X(24206) = X(5691)+5*X(12017) = 3*X(14561)-X(38035) = 3*X(14561)+X(38116) = X(38035)+3*X(38047) = X(38040)-3*X(38079) = 3*X(38047)-X(38116) = 3*X(38079)+X(38165) = 3*X(38089)-X(38118) = 3*X(38089)+X(38146)
</b>
<p>
X(38167) lies on these lines: {6,9956}, {10,18583}, {30,38089}, {182,18480}, {355,3618}, {511,11231}, {515,38110}, {516,38136}, {517,14561}, {518,11230}, {519,38040}, {524,38083}, {576,3844}, {758,38169}, {952,38049}, {1351,1698}, {1385,3589}, {1386,25555}, {1503,38140}, {1656,3751}, {2802,38168}, {3564,10175}, {3579,5480}, {4663,24206}, {5050,5587}, {5085,28160}, {5691,12017}, {5762,38194}, {5790,16475}, {5843,38187}, {5844,38191}, {5845,38172}, {5846,38176}, {5847,38042}, {5848,38182}, {5849,38183}, {5850,38164}, {6684,21850}, {7989,18440}, {10172,34379}, {14848,19875}, {14853,26446}, {15988,17619}, {19130,22793}, {28198,38072}, {28204,38029}, {28208,38064}, {31423,33878}, {31663,31670}</p>
<p>
X(38167) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5050, 5587}, {5790, 16475}, {14561, 38047}, {14848, 19875}, {14853, 26446}, {38029, 38144}, {38035, 38116}, {38040, 38165}, {38118, 38146}<br>
X(38167) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (14561, 38116, 38035), (38035, 38047, 38116), (38079, 38165, 38040), (38089, 38146, 38118), (38197, 38198, 38049)<br>
</p>
